title: Learn to Paint: Warhammer 40,000 Introductory Set
description:
This Warhammer 40,000 Introductory Set is your entry point to the world's greatest hobby! The set contains everything you need to enjoy Warhammer to its fullest - and in this video we’ll be showing you budding painters how to paint your miniatures ready for the gaming table in no time.        
If you're new to painting - check out our Citadel Colour Painting Essentials videos to learn all about it

CHAPTERS:
00:00 - Intro
01:30 - Macragge Blue: Space Marines
04:04 - Abaddon Black: Space Marines
05:14 - Balthasar Gold: Space Marines
06:13 - Naggaroth Night: Space Marines
06:33 - Wraithbone: Space Marines
07:18 - Basing with Abaddon Black: Space Marines
07:43 - Basing with Armageddon Dust: Space Marines
09:43 - Wraithbone: Tyranids
10:28 - Naggaroth Night: Tyranids
11:09 - Abaddon Black: Tyranids
11:57 - Basing with Armageddon Dust: Tyranids

Don't forget to like, share and subscribe and to ring the bell to make sure you keep up to date with all our latest videos!
